full_summary:
### Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN)

#### Tender Notice

**Contract Title:** Court Reporting Services
**Contract Reference Number:** cb-562-65006414
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 5X001-24-0029

**Publication Date:** May 22, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** June 5, 2024, 2:00 pm Eastern Daylight Time

**Background:**
The Courts Administration Service (CAS) requires the services of a bilingual Court Reporter who holds a valid Top-Secret SIGINT clearance to provide Court Reporting and Transcription services on an as-and-when-required basis. The work must be performed primarily in Ottawa with possible services in other CAS offices across Canada.

**Objectives:**
CAS seeks a supplier who can provide:

* Court Reporting and Transcription services in both French and English
* Certified French and English transcripts of court proceedings

**Tasks:**

* Provide English and French Court Reporting and Transcription services at court hearings or sessions
* Prepare English and French certified transcripts of court hearings or sessions

**Requirements:**
To be considered, suppliers must demonstrate the following:

* Ability to provide a Court Reporter with a valid Top-Secret SIGINT clearance delivered by the Contract Security Program (CSP) division of Public Service and Procurement Canada (PSPC)
* Ability to provide Court Reporting services in English and French
* Ability to provide Transcription services in English and French
* Minimum of 1 (one) year of experience providing Court Reporting and Transcription services
* Court reporting certification from a recognized organization in Canada
* Ability to work in the National Capital Region (NCR) on short notice and travel to other locations within Canada on short notice

**Trade Agreements:**
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Procurement Method:**
This procurement will be carried out through an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), allowing other suppliers to signal their interest in bidding by submitting a statement of capabilities.

**Submission Instructions:**
Suppliers interested in submitting a statement of capabilities may do so in writing to Leticia Obeng Asante, Manager, Procurement and Material Management, Courts Administration Service, 90 Sparks Street, Ottawa, ON K1A 0H9. Statements of capabilities must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

**Closing Date and Time:**
June 5, 2024, 2:00 pm Eastern Day
